dateStart.description: Show orders created at or after datetime. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-21T13:24:51+0300)

dateEnd.description: Show orders created at or before datetime. yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format is used (e.g., 2022-07-25T13:24:51+0300)

customerEmail.description: Filter by a customer's email address.

customerPhone.description: Filter by a customer's phone number.

productId.description: Filter by a product by specifying product ID.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to be returned in result set.
